title: Misleading step method in lr_scheduler.ReduceLROnPlateau
body_html:
Since ReduceLROnPlateau takes an optimizer as argument, one can reasonably assume that it wraps the optimizer and the step method from the ReduceLROnPlateau object will actually call the step method of the optimizer.

Alternatives:

  • put a warning in the documentation: "the optimizer's parameters are not going to be updated"
  • put an example with an optimizer.step() call in the documentation
  • change the step method name, why not update ?
  • implement a optimizer_step method to explicitly allow the user to call the optimizer step method from the ReduceLROnPlateau object
